import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedDataService } from '../../../shared-data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { constructor(private sharedData : SharedDataService){} projectData: any; ngOnInit(): void { this.projectData = this.sharedData.getProjectDeatils(); } }
